item.title: By: Curt Stone
item.dc:creator: Curt Stone
item.description: <p>I was just making some changes to some Hide/Whens today and I was reflecting on this nightmare. Funny that I read your post today reflecting on this issue too. We've come so far!</p>
item.content:encoded: I was just making some changes to some Hide/Whens today and I was reflecting on this nightmare. Funny that I read your post today reflecting on this issue too. We’ve come so far!

item.title: By: Nathan T. Freeman
item.dc:creator: Nathan T. Freeman
item.description: <p>Glad I could help. And yes, it is a lot like hide-whens back in the day.<br /><br />PARDEFs are the work of the devil. <img alt="Emoticon" src="<a rel="nofollow ugc">http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLY/$File/smile.gif"</a> /></p>
item.content:encoded:
Glad I could help. And yes, it is a lot like hide-whens back in the day.

PARDEFs are the work of the devil. http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLY/$File/smile.gif“ />
